short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract enrolled Haas course schedules from OLR

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Haas Schedule Extractor is a simple yet powerful tool that helps Berkeley MBA students quickly retrieve and organize their enrolled course schedules from OLR. With just a click, users can view their course list, load detailed schedules, and even download the schedule in an easily shareable .ics file format for calendar integration.
